metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6271 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Bzrtp library (aka libbzrtp) 1.0.x before 1.0.4 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct spoofing attacks by leveraging a missing HVI check on DHPart2 packet reception.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbzrtp0 - 1.0.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bzrtp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.6-2').
